name: inventory
description: Manage items within your active container

options.name: add
options.description: Add an item to your active container

options.name: quantity
options.description: Quantity of the item to add. Defaults to 1

options.name: note
options.description: Add a note to the item (max 350 characters).

options.name: inside-this-item
options.description: Put item inside-this-item. Failure won't prevent item from being added to container.

options.name: drop
options.description: Drop an item from your active container

options.name: quantity
options.description: Quantity of the item to drop. Defaults to 1

options.name: drop-contents
options.description: If true and item is container, contents will be dropped with item.
